Cellphine:
Hmm, it sounds like you are asking about Sayune. When the war between the gods and Giants began the Giants needed a way to move swiftly. Sayune, the daughter of Sayha and a Giant, infused her powers into the ground in places. This allowed others to jump to different locations in the same manner she did.
Of course one would only be able to do this if they became Awakened, otherwise you would never be able to see itâ€¦ and if you could, you would never be able to use it.
